mapper.select: select flow_id id, schedule_id scheduleId, user_id userId, status status, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate from t_apass_repay_flow where status = 'S' and user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY createDate DESC limit 1

select flow_id id, schedule_id scheduleId, user_id userId, repay_amt repayAmt, repay_date repayDate, status status, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate from t_apass_repay_flow where status = 'S' and repay_date >= #{dateBegin} and repay_date < #{dateEnd}
